name: tim-nz.jshint2
title: JSHint2
description: Adds JSHint support to Brackets. A fork of Raymond Camden's JSHint extension, updated to JSHint 2.13.6. The only JavaScript linter extension for Brackets updated in the last five years.
author: Tim-NZ <tim.nz.github@gmail.com> (https://github.com/tim-nz)
